title: Has the Ministry of Justice requested detailed information on all visitors to an anti-tramp website?
subtitle: An online host company states that they are obliged to deliver all information about a website against Trump that helped organize the protests on the day of the inauguration.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: The United States Department of Justice is trying to capture the information of everyone who visited the anti-tramp website and is disrupting the J20.org website.
